body.name: XTU Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Wireless Chime, Door Bell Ringer Wireless with Camera, Voice Changer, PIR Human Detection, No Monthly fees, Battery-Powered Smart WiFi Doorbell
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 46 mins
features: Voice Changer-100% Wire: XTU J9 wireless doorbell camera has upgraded changing voices. Besides, it's the extra set of eyes and ears needed to protect your home. Designed for 2.4G Wi-Fi (5G Wi-Fi not supported), this doorbell camera comes with a free Doorbell Chime to ensure you never miss a visitor, no matter where you are.
PIR Motion Detection: Enable the AI human detection function to accurately identify people and ignore other moving objects like cars and trees.

145 °angle View-IR Night Vision: XTU video doorbell can provide you with 1080P high-definition real-time image and video recording, and it will not miss any 145 ° angle of view! When the night light weakens, its infrared light will automatically turn on, bringing you an advanced night vision experience.
Two-Way Communication: Containing in microphone and speaker make it easier to talk to visitors whether you are at home or outside. Engage with visitors anytime, anywhere for seamless communication.

Secure Cloud Storage-Local Storage: The camera doorbell wireless adopts financial encryption, with a 7-day trial of the Subscription Plan, supports up to 128G Micro SD storage, and Cloud storage. You’ll never miss out on a moment with remote and playback video with the encrypted Cloud service wherever you are.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XTU Wireless Video Doorbell Camera WiFi Video Doorbell Camera Your home’s safety is always top of mind. Video doorbell is the extra set of eyes and ears needed to protect your home. The WiFi Video Doorbell Camera is on a mission to help make neighborhoods safer — starting at the front door. This service makes everyday life easier for residents and businesses in buildings and at the same time simplifies management for owners. With our XTU Wireless Doorbell Camera, convenience and peace of mind are always at your fingertips whether you’re home or away.

PIR Motion Detection Wireless doorbell camera built-in the PIR Sensor. When it detects the motion, the smart video doorbell will rapidly wake up and push alert notifications to your phone. You will not miss any important moment in front of the door.

Two-Way Audio Camera doorbell built-in microphone and speaker providing you with real-time clear two-way audio, you can see, hear and talk with the visitors immediately, or select a pre-recorded voice message for quick replies.

Secure Cloud Storage-Group Sharing The camera doorbell wireless adopts financial encryption, with a 7-day trial of the Subscription Plan, supports up to 128G Micro SD storage, and Cloud storage. You’ll never miss out on a moment with remote and playback video with the encrypted Cloud service wherever you are. The XTU J9 doorbell camera supports multiple device connections. You can share the monitor with others by scanning their CloudEdge QR code. It can support unlimited users. Allow all your family members to monitor the security of your home.

FAQ: Q: What APP does the doorbell camera support? A: The doorbell camera only support"CloudEdge" APP. Q: What network mode is the video doorbell compatible with? A: The video doorbell only support 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi , not work with 5Ghz Wi-Fi. Q:Does the wireless video doorbell camera with indoor chime? A: Yes, the wireless video doorbell included the indoor chime. Q:What‘s the operating conditions? A: You can use the doorbell camera in -5°F to 120°F (-20°C to 48°C). Q: Does the camera doorbell can be supported view in real time/live view? A: Yes, open the app and click on the live button, will allow you view any time in real time. Q: How to charge the doorbell camera? A:The doorbell camera is compatible with the DC 5V 1A or 5V 2A charger with USB interface(phone charger is ok). The package included the USB cable. Please fully charge the video doorbell before the first use (It takes 8 to 10 hours to fully charge). You can see the battery level on the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy to have gotten this love it!!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this.. I love how easy it was to install myself the instructions were great very detailed. The picture come up very clean in the day AND EVEN AT NIGHT I love how I’m able to get motion detection (most of the time it’s a car or deer ) but it’s great I can my kids coming and going ir people at my house when I’m not there no need to leave a note on the door I can just talk to them I also love the alarm feature when I see someone just standing around and it was easy to set up in my phone and I see the alerts on my Apple Watch as well well worth it I caught it at a discounted price on prime days and I’m so glad I didn’t spend extra for a house hold name I love this I have one at my front and back door

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does what is expected, the videos are sharp and clear. The motion detection, sound quality is perfect! Easy to install. I didn’t want to spend a lot , Great value! Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will No Longer Charge
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these and had no issues in the beginning. A full charge would last about 2 months (using the lowest power settings); now, they are both losing power rapidly and the cables provided no longer work.I can't even charge them now. Emails to customer support have gone unanswered. Do not waste your money because you will be looking for something else within a few months based on other customer reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product is very good. The customer service is very good. My representative was very prompt in solving my problem with my questions about my product. I am very pleased with the service that I received. The service rep. was knowledgeable and professional. Good experience overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this doorbell camera. It was very easy and quick to set up. It’s clear and perfect lightening at night. I’m so happy that now I can see whoever is around or approaching my home. I just ordered a second one for my back door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Image quality not great and doesn’t always work after awhile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Where is customer service?
reviews.reviewText: I read all of the reviews & was impressed - easy install, good quality camera, etc….so I bought it!Unfortunately, I couldn’t get it to connect to my WiFi - could it be user error? Maybe? Probably? Either way, I emailed customer service, but didn’t get a response. I went to the manufacturer’s website & tried the “chat” option, but was directed to email customer service. So, I emailed customer service again & asked them to call me.In the end, I need the camera immediately, and because I couldn’t connect with anyone from customer service today, I’m shipping it back tomorrow & I have a Blink doorbell arriving tomorrow. Fingers crossed I have better luck.***disclosure - in all fairness, my emails and chat attempt only spanned about a 5 hour window, so maybe if I were more patient, I’d hear from someone within the next day or so, but I really wanted to talk to a human today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
